name: Mawile
description: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
